channel.title: Gol Gumbaz on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu
channel.description: Recent content in Gol Gumbaz on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu

item.title: Bijapur-Chitradurga
item.description: Day-5, Woke up at 4:30 in the morning as I could barely sleep whole night. Had mu bath and got little bit packing down to ensure we leave Bijapur at the earliest. Woke Pamela & Aarush around 5:30 and we started to walk to Gol Gumbaz. Unfortunately the lady who manages the ticket counter did not show up till 6:30. We were the first one to enter. After the local guard gving us little more history lesson asked us to climb the steps quickly before anyone.
